00020 #ifndef CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETER_PARTS_EXTRACTOR_HPP
00021 #define CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETER_PARTS_EXTRACTOR_HPP
00022 
00023 #include "types.hpp"
00024 
00025 #include <boost/algorithm/string.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/scoped_ptr.hpp>
00027 
00030 namespace clpp {
00031 
00034 namespace detail {
00035 
00038 class parameter_parts_extractor {
00039 public:
00040     explicit parameter_parts_extractor( const std::string& _name_value_separator ) :
00041             name_value_separator( _name_value_separator ) {}
00042 private:
00043     const std::string name_value_separator;
00044 public:
00045     std::string extract_name_from( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00046         str_storage inputed_parameter_parts = obtain_parts_of( inputed_parameter );
00047         const size_t parts_quantity = inputed_parameter_parts.size();
00048         std::string name = inputed_parameter;
00049         if ( 2 == parts_quantity ) {
00050             name = inputed_parameter_parts.front();
00051         } else if ( parts_quantity > 2 ) {
00052             notify_about_name_value_separator_repetition_in( inputed_parameter );
00053         }
00054         return name;
00055     }
00056 
00057     std::string extract_value_from( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00058         str_storage inputed_parameter_parts = obtain_parts_of( inputed_parameter );
00059         const size_t parts_quantity = inputed_parameter_parts.size();
00060         std::string value = inputed_parameter;
00061         if ( 2 == parts_quantity ) {
00062             value = inputed_parameter_parts.back();
00063         } else if ( parts_quantity > 2 ) {
00064             notify_about_name_value_separator_repetition_in( inputed_parameter );
00065         }
00066         return value;
00067     }
00068 private:
00069     str_storage obtain_parts_of( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00070         str_storage parts;
00071         boost::split( parts, inputed_parameter, boost::is_any_of( name_value_separator ) );
00072         return parts;
00073     }
00074 
00075     void notify_about_name_value_separator_repetition_in( const std::string& inputed_parameter ) const {
00076         const std::string what_happened = lib_prefix() 
00077                                           + "Name-value separator repetition detected in parameter '" 
00078                                           + inputed_parameter + "'!";
00079         throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00080     }
00081 };
00082 
00083 typedef boost::scoped_ptr< parameter_parts_extractor > parameter_parts_extractor_p;
00084 
00085 } // namespace detail
00086 } // namespace clpp
00087 
00088 #endif // CLPP_DETAIL_PARAMETER_PARTS_EXTRACTOR_HPP
